means: 进行解剖，进行详细分析

word_mean: 解剖：切开或分离，尤指学习解剖时暴露尸体的解剖结构

sentence.Network_en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

sentence.Network_en: He watched her peel and dissect a pear neatly, no mess, no sticky fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看着她利索地削完梨，再切成块，没有弄得乱七八糟，手指也没弄得黏糊糊的。

sentence.Network_en: Isn't a fortnight long enough for you to dissect my personality?
sentence.Network_cn: 你用了两个星期的时间对我的人品乱加评论,难道还不够 吗 ?

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin dissect- 'cut up', from the verb dissecare, from dis- 'apart' + secare 'to cut'

entry.def: If someone dissects the body of a dead person or animal, they carefully cut it up in order to examine it scientifically.

example.ex: We dissected a frog in biology class.
example.tran: 我们在生物课上解剖了一只青蛙。

entry.def: If someone dissects something such as a theory, a situation, or a piece of writing, they consider and talk about each detail of it.

example.ex: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
example.tran: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

means.word_mean: 2. make a mathematical, chemical, or grammatical analysis of; break down into components or essential features;

auth_sentence.content: We now wish to dissect the mechanisms of caveolae-mediated mechanotransduction.
auth_sentence.res_content: We now wish to dissect the mechanisms of caveolae-mediated mechanotransduction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We now wish to dissect the mechanisms of caveolae-mediated mechanotransduction.

auth_sentence.content: "I'm not going to dissect the campaign," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I'm not going to dissect the campaign," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I'm not going to dissect the campaign," he said.

auth_sentence.content: Science and religion only dissect at a point, both of them need funding.
auth_sentence.res_content: Science and religion only dissect at a point, both of them need funding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Science and religion only dissect at a point, both of them need funding.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sect切,割+arian……的,有人的意思→把人群分开的→搞宗派的
section[[n.章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面]]糠?al……的→adj.可组合的
dissect[v.解剖;详细研究]+ion表名词→n.解剖,切开
in进入+sect切,割→昆虫一节一节如被切开

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相交,交叉;道路交叉口,十字路口
stems_affixes.word_buile: intersect[v.横断]+ion表名词→n.相交,交叉;道路交叉口,十字路口

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面
stems_affixes.word_buile: sect切,割+ion表名词→n.章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面
inter在……中间+sect切割 →在中间切→横断

sentences.cn: 每个标本都被细心解剖。

sentences.en: He dissected the plan afterward to learn why it had failed.
sentences.cn: 他事后仔细剖析那项计划以便搞清它失败的原因。
